item.description:
Let's try ice skating!  This rink has public skating on Sundays from 12:00 - 2:00 pm and they also rent skates.  See you all at noon and I'll have a big TOBIE sign.  When I walk around with the Old Ladies Travel sign people really look at me strangely!

By the way I used to teach kids and adults to skate about a million years ago so if anyone doesn't know how or has forgotten I can probably help, assuming I can still skate at all anymore...

We'll do this again after the holidays if people are interested.  Maybe it can even be a weekly thing.
item.how_to_find_us: I'll have a sign that says "TOBIE"

group.name: Old and Not so Old Ladies Travel

item.name: Ice skating
